Text.Page:
You've heard that Killian's brainwashing the Tenebrara mercenaries, right?

Well, once we got control of that situation, he stepped up his game.

It's hard, but so far, we're holding it together.

Now he's turned the lancers and sorcerers, so the most powerful are also the most danger to us.

Can you help us out?

I can't tell you the pressure that you've relieved. Thank you, .

And here's something for you.
